titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation commanding all papists and reputed papists forthwith to depart from the cities of London and Westminster and from within ten miles of the same
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the seventeenth day of June, 1690, in the second year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
